name: Register
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for registering the new mentor

Request payload must contain the following fields:

username: STRING,
password: STRING,
mobile: STRING,
full_name: STRING,
role: STRING,
team_id: STRING,
data_of_birth: STRING ( format: "yyyy-mm-dd" ),
organization_code: STRING,
qualification: STRING,
created_by: NUMBER ( 11 characters ),
city: STRING,
district: STRING,
state: STRING,
country: STRING,

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentors/register

raw 
  {
    "username": "mentorbV7uRJEGl8J6pcJ3hF31@unisolve.org",
    "full_name": "mentor user",
    "password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs=",
    "mobile": "9986009265",
    "role": "MENTOR",
    "team_id": "12433",
    "date_of_birth": "1989-06-20",
    "organization_code" : "30Augrk223",
    "qualification": "bs.c",
    "city": "hyderabad",
    "district": "somehthing",
    "state": "tg",
    "country": "bs.c",
    "created_by": 1236547899
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"User registered successfully","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:46.509Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:46.509Z","status":"ACTIVE","updated_by":null,"mentor_id":102,"full_name":"mentor user","mobile":"9986009265","team_id":"12433","date_of_birth":"1989-06-20T00:00:00.000Z","organization_code":"30Augrk223","qualification":"bs.c","city":"hyderabad","district":"somehthing","state":"tg","country":"bs.c","created_by":1236547899,"reg_status":1,"user_id":377,"username":"mentorbV7uRJEGl8J6pcJ3hF31@unisolve.org","otp":"112233"}]}
